text.autoconfig.AutoTpa.option.autoAccep:
When enabled, all TPA requests will be accepted automatically (no confirmation required)!
Warning! This mod has a known medium-risk bug that cannot be fixed
This bug may cause requests from blacklisted users to be accepted
text.autoconfig.AutoTpa.option.blacklist: Players who are not allowed to send TPA requests
text.autoconfig.AutoTpa.option.tpaPatter: Regular expression pattern to identify TPA request messages
The first capture group (\w+) will be treated as player name
Default value works for most Chinese servers
text.autoconfig.AutoTpa.option.onlyFromF: Only auto-accept TPA requests from friends
text.autoconfig.AutoTpa.option.showNotif: Show notifications in chat when auto-accepting
text.autoconfig.AutoTpa.option.whitelist: Players who are always allowed to send TPA requests
text.autoconfig.AutoTpa.title: Auto TPA Settings
